short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes all +1 and :+1 comments from Github issues and pull requests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of all those +1 comments on Github pull requests and issues? This extension removes all these annoying comments so you can focus on what really matters!
